samples.question: And do you think having a routine helps you to concentrate better?
samples.transcript: Yeah, yeah. it is one of those most effective and efficient ways that someone can take into practice and can put into practice to help improve their concentration.

samples.question: Is fashion important to you?
samples.transcript: Not really much. Actually I have never thought about it. it is a tricky question for me. But sometimes I really care about it. For example when I want to hang out with a special friend, I really care about how I am going to look like.

samples.question: Is it very common in your country to have people standing in queues and waiting?
samples.transcript: In some occasions, and yeah of course, for example if you want to buy some dairy purchases, dairy products, groceries, some things we do have every day. Yeah, it is common, it is common and you need to stay in a queue.

samples.question: Do you think that technology has played an impressive role to reduce waiting time?
samples.transcript: Yeah, of course. In the past few decades, it really has helped a lot because we used to, we used to stand on queues just for taxi or bus. But we do not need to do that anymore and we can get a car right now, we can get a taxi by just, by just using our, phones. Okay, and. it is a, it is a lot more convenient. So do you think that it can, it has also, been effective, when you want to go to banks and supermarkets or using Do you still need to wait for a long time? Well about supermarkets, no I do not think so because there are a lot of groceries and supermarkets all over the country, all over the city that anyone can access easily to these shops and purchase their willing products. samples.question: How do you feel when someone breaks the line impatiently?
samples.transcript: It really works on my nerves when someone does that. So that is all I would do in this situation.

samples.question: What hobbies are common in your culture?
samples.transcript: Well, Iranians have always been so interested in having different entertainments. One of the hobbies that is popular among my friends is collecting comic books. I know some people might say that it is not that commonly done among Iranians, but it is. People like collecting different comic books, including comics from other countries.
samples.transcript_original: Well, Iranians have always been so interested in having different entertainments. One of the hobbies that is popular among my friends is collecting comic books. I know some people might say that it's not that commonly done among Iranians, but it is. People like collecting different comic books, including comics from other countries.

samples.question: However, people like collecting other things like, coins or stamps or some artistic people or creative people might, like paintings and drawings.
samples.transcript: Although I think it is, it can be an expensive collection.. Okay.
samples.transcript_original: Although I think it's, uh, it can be an expensive collection. Um. Okay.

samples.question: And are there any hobbies that you think are not worthwhile?
samples.transcript: To be honest, some hobbies can be a real waste of time for me. for example, People collecting baseball cards is not one of my favorites because I am so uninterested in baseball. But of course I cannot say that it cannot be worthwhile for someone who enjoys baseball and likes this hobby. So I think that having a hobby is fine as long as it is not harmful to yourself and other people and as long as you are having fun with it so it is okay and it is worth doing it.

samples.question: Okay, and why do you think people have hobbies?
samples.transcript: I think people, have different entertainments, in their free time because they want to relax. After a whole week of working or studying, we all need some time to relax and, enjoy ourselves. also, people might, have hobbies to learn some new skills like, drawing, like, knitting, Or even learning a new language. and the other thing that I can think of is, finding new people and new friends. You can join groups of like-minded people, that have the same hobbies as you do and that can be so great and fun. so I think, these are the reasons why people allocate time to hobbies. Right.

samples.question: And how important is it to encourage children to take up hobbies?

samples.question: And do you think it is also important for older people, like retired people, to take up maybe a few hobbies?
samples.transcript: Yes, obviously. Hobbies, as I said before, can help you relax and enjoy your free time. It can also be useful to take your mind off some of the problems that you might have, work problems, personal problems, And you can just enjoy what you are doing and have fun, as long as you want and you can. So it can be a great idea to have hobbies no matter how old are you or, how many problems you have in your life.

samples.question: Why do people do charity for others?
samples.transcript: I think people do charity for others because it is part of the empathetic side of the human heart. To just, see the needs in other people and just help them out with that because everybody struggles.
samples.transcript_original: I think people do charity for others because it's part of the empathetic side of the human heart. To just, uh, see the needs in other people and just help them out with that because everybody struggles.

samples.question: And do you think charity work is a selfish thing to do?
samples.transcript: It depends of the intentions of the person that does it because some people generally, help without expecting anything in return. But there is other people that expect some recognition or just to feel like they are, good people for doing small actions.
samples.transcript_original: It depends of the intentions of the person that does it because some people generally, uh, help without expecting anything in return. But there's other people that expect some recognition or just to feel like they're, uh, good people for doing small actions.

samples.question: And what kinds of charities are there in your country?
samples.transcript: Oh, there are many charities in my country. But the most famous ones are Teletone, which is for disabled children. Red Nose for children with cancer. And there are many that help the elderly as well.
